actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Financial Services
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking and Financial Services. subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Banking and Financial Services
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Financial Institutions and Consumer Credit.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Financial Institutions and Consumer Credit

official_title: To amend the Community Reinvestment Act of 1977 to enhance the availability of investment capital for low- and moderate-income housing in low- and moderate-income neighborhoods.

summary.text: Community Reinvestment Improvement Act of 1995 - Amends the Community Reinvestment Act of 1977 to permit lenders to participate in affordable housing programs for Federal or State targeted low-and moderate-income neighborhoods (which may be outside of their lending areas).

titles.title: To amend the Community Reinvestment Act of 1977 to enhance the availability of investment capital for low- and moderate-income housing in low- and moderate-income neighborhoods.
